ebi.name: Ebi
ebi.description: Ebi are a popular tempura ingredient that can be found on virtually all tempura dishes.

sakana.name: Sakana
sakana.description: Sakana are small fillets or whole small fish which are made into tempura pieces.

kabocha.name: Kabocha
kabocha.description: Kabocha are Japanese pumpkin with a thin, typically dark green skin and orange flesh.

About.title: A biased Next.js documentation site template
About.intro: Nextempura is built with Next.js, styled using SCSS and CSS variables, supports internationalization with next-intl, features markdown documentation through unified and remark, and supports dark theme.
About.use: This template is not intended for out-of-box use; instead, it provides components that you can use to develop a custom template tailored to your preferences.
